$UMASK being true is deprecated it will be false by default in the future. This change is being made because this not the behavior of the unix command `chmod`. This warning can be disabled by putting explicitly setting $File::chmod::UMASK to false (0) to act like system chmod, or any non 2 true value see Github issue #5  at t/02_run.t line 40.
